isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000i, 9000i - REMOVE - REMOVE SPLASH PANELS

svcsubproc.title: Remove Splash Panels on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA) and 9400 i (SBA)

step1.para: Release hood latches on each side of the hood and tilt the hood assembly to a 45 degree angle. Support the tilted hood with a floor stand to relieve tension on the tilt assist spring assemblies.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 8 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove cotter pin and flat washer (Item 1) from retaining pin (Item 2), then pull out the retaining pin securing tilt assist spring assembly clevis (Item 3) to the tilt assist spring bracket (Item 4) on top of the radiator (Item 6) and remove it, passenger side shown.
Remove tilt assist spring assembly (Item 7) from the hood tilt assist spring bracket (Item 5), passenger side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 16. Remove Splash Panels on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA) and 9400 i (SBA)

calloutgroup.callout1: 7. CLEARANCE HOLE (NO MOUNTING HARDWARE TO BE INSTALLED)

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 16 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove the two hex screw assembly fasteners (Item 1) securing the hood tilt assist spring bracket (Item 2) to the splash panel (Item 3) and hood/fender assembly (Item 4) and remove the hood tilt assist spring bracket, driver side shown.
Remove seven hex bolts (Item 5) attaching splash panel (Item 3) to hood/fender assembly (Item 4) and remove the splash panel, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove the passenger side hood/fender assembly splash panel.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Splash Panels on 9900 i (SFA) and 9900 ix (SFA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 17 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With hood tilted open, remove nine hex screw assembly fasteners (Item 1) attaching the splash panel (Item 2) and body splash shield (Item 3) to the hood assembly (Item 4) and remove the splash panel and body splash shield, driver side shown.
To remove body splash shield (Item 3) from the hood assembly (Item 4), remove body splash shield retainers (Item 5) and separate body splash shield from the splash panel (Item 2), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side splash panel and body splash shield.

figure.caption: Figure 17. Remove Splash Panels on 9900 i (SFA) and 9900 ix (SFA)

svcsubproc.title: Remove Chassis Mounted Splash Panels on 5900 i (SFA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 18 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With hood tilted open, remove four hex bolts, lock washers and flat washers (Items 1, 2 and 3) securing chassis mounted splash panel (Item 4) to the front and rear chassis splash panel mounting brackets (Items 5 and 6) and remove chassis mounted splash panel, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side chassis mounted splash panel.

figure.caption: Figure 18. Remove Chassis Mounted Splash Panels on 5900 i (SFA)

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. FRONT CHASSIS SPLASH PANEL MOUNTING BRACKET
6. REAR CHASSIS SPLASH PANEL MOUNTING BRACKET

svcsubproc.title: Remove Hood Mounted Splash Panels on 5900 i (SFA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 19 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With hood tilted open, remove seven hex screw assembly fasteners (Item 1) securing hood mounted splash panel (Item 2) to hood assembly (Item 3), driver side shown.

Remove two hex bolts (Item 4) and two hex nuts, lock washers and flat washers (Items 5, 6 and 7) from hood mounted splash panel (Item 2) and splash panel mounting bracket (Item 8) and remove hood mounted splash panel, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side hood mounted splash panel.

figure.caption: Figure 19. Remove Hood Mounted Splash Panels on 5900 i (SFA)

svcsubproc.title: Remove Chassis Mounted Splash Panels on 5500 i (SFA)

figure.caption: Figure 20. Remove Chassis Mounted Splash Panels and Mud Guards on 5500 i (SFA)

calloutgroup.callout1: 6. CHASSIS SPLASH PANEL AND MUD GUARD MOUNTING BRACKET

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 20 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With hood tilted open, remove four hex bolts with flat washers (Items 1 and 2) and four hex nuts with lock washers (Items 3 and 4) securing chassis mounted splash panel (Item 5) to the chassis splash panel and mud guard mounting bracket (Item 6), driver side shown.

note.para: It is not required to remove the fifth hex bolt and flat washer (Items 7 and 8) and hex nut and lock washer (Items 9 and 10) to remove chassis mounted splash panel (Item 5).

step1.para: Remove two hex bolts, lock washers and flat washers (Items 11, 12 and 13) attaching chassis mounted splash panel (Item 5) to front chassis splash panel bracket (Items 14) and remove chassis mounted splash panel, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side chassis mounted splash panel.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Hood Mounted Splash Panels on 5500 i (SFA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 21 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With hood tilted open, drill out twelve rivets (Item 1) attaching hood mounted splash panel (Item 2) to hood assembly (Item 3), driver side shown.

Remove three hex bolts, lock washers and flat washers (Items 4, 5 and 6) securing the front of the hood mounted splash panel (Item 2) to the front of the hood assembly (Item 3) and remove hood mounted splash panel, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side hood mounted splash panel.

figure.caption: Figure 21. Remove Hood Mounted Splash Panels on 5500 i (SFA)

svcsubproc.title: Remove Chassis Mounted Splash Panels on 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 22 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With hood tilted open, remove four hex bolts and flat washers (Items 1 and 2) and four hex nuts and lock washers (Items 3 and 4) attaching chassis mounted splash panel (Item 5) to the chassis splash panel and mud guard bracket (Items 6), driver side shown.

note.para: It is not required to remove the fifth hex bolt and flat washer (Items 7 and 8) and hex nut and lock washer (Items 9 and 10) to remove chassis mounted splash panel (Item 5).

figure.caption: Figure 22. Remove Chassis Mounted Splash Panels and Mud Guards on 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood

calloutgroup.callout1: 6. CHASSIS SPLASH PANEL AND MUD GUARD BRACKET

step1.para: Remove two hex bolts, lock washers and flat washers (Items 11, 12 and 13) attaching chassis mounted splash panel (Item 5) to the front chassis splash panel bracket (Item 14), driver side shown.

Remove hex bolt, lock washer and flat washer (Items 15, 16 and 17) attaching chassis mounted splash panel (Item 5) to the side of cab mounting bracket (Item 18) and remove chassis mounted splash panel, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side chassis mounted splash panel.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Hood Mounted Splash Panels on 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 23 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With hood tilted open, remove three hex bolts, lock washers and flat washers (Items 1, 2 and 3) securing hood mounted splash panel and body splash shield (Item 4) with splash panel seal (Item 5) to the hood splash panel mounting bracket (Item 6) at the front of the hood assembly (Item 7), driver side shown.

Remove hex bolt and flat washer (Items 8 and 9) and hex lock nut (Item 10) securing hood mounted splash panel and body splash shield (Item 4) with splash panel seal (Item 5) to the headlight bezel reinforcement bracket (Item 11), driver side shown.

Remove five rivets (Item 12) securing hood mounted splash panel and body splash shield (Item 4) with splash panel seal (Item 5) to the hood splash panel bracket (Item 13) on the inside of the hood assembly (Item 7) and remove hood mounted splash panel and body splash shield, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side hood splash panel and body splash shield.

figure.caption: Figure 23. Remove Hood Mounted Splash Panels on 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood

calloutgroup.callout1: 4. HOOD MOUNTED SPLASH PANEL AND BODY SPLASH SHIELD

step1.para: To remove splash panel seal (Item 5), remove nine rivets and cup washers (Items 14 and 15) securing splash panel seal to the bottom edge of hood splash panel and body splash shield (Item 4) and remove splash panel seal, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side splash panel seal.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Hood Mounted Splash Panels on 5600 i (SBA) 8 X 4 with Tilt Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 24 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With hood tilted open, remove two hex bolts, lock washers and flat washers (Items 1, 2 and 3) securing hood mounted splash panel and body splash shield (Item 4) to the hood splash panel mounting bracket (Item 5) at the front of the hood assembly (Item 6), driver side shown.
Drill out rivet (Item 7) securing hood mounted splash panel and body splash shield (Item 4) to the splash panel fender brace (Item 8), driver side shown.

Drill out four rivets (Item 9) securing hood mounted splash panel and body splash shield (Item 4) to the hood splash panel bracket (Item 10) on inside of hood, and remove hood mounted splash panel and body splash shield, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side hood mounted splash panel and body splash shield.

figure.caption: Figure 24. Remove Hood Mounted Splash Panels on 5600 i (SBA) 8 X 4 with Tilt Hood

svcsubproc.title: Remove Splash Panels on 5600 i (SBA) With Optional Butterfly Hood
svcsubproc.para: The splash panel and fender are removed together as an assembly. Refer to REMOVE FENDERS .
